triples.name: Robot navigation
triples.relevance: Navigation2 proposes new methods for robot navigation in dynamic environments and modern sensor systems.

triples.name: Robot Operating System
triples.relevance: Navigation2 builds on ROS Navigation and is built on top of ROS2, a secure message passing framework for robotics.

triples.name: Behavior tree (artificial intelligence, robotics and control)
triples.relevance: Navigation2 uses behavior trees for navigator task orchestration, a key architectural component of the new system.

triples.name: Autonomous robot
triples.relevance: Navigation2 enables robots to operate autonomously in warehouses, retail stores, and alongside pedestrians.
